sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Daffy's original and famous Elixir salutis : the choice drink of health, or, health-bringing drink, being a famous cordial drink, found out by the providence of the almighty, and ... experiences by my self and other divers persons ... a most excellent preservative of mankind. A secret far beyond any medicament yet known ... the same being fitted unto all ages, sexes, complexions and constitutions ... / Never published by any but Anthony Daffy, and now by me Elias Daffy his son. Daffy, Anthony. Daffy, Elias.
[8], 8 p.
Printed with allowance for the author, London : 1698.
Imperfect: faded, torn with loss of text. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======

A secret far beyond any medicament yet known ... the same being fitted unto all ages, sexes, complexions and constitutions ... / Never published by any but Anthony Daffy, and now by me Elias Daffy his son. Daffy, Anthony. Daffy, Elias.
[8], 8 p.
Printed with allowance for the author, London : 1698.
Imperfect: faded, torn with loss of text. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
